ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine was ready for the return fire and hit the ground dodging most of the barrage. The shots that found thier mark pushed him back, his frame was holding

Lunarpine was ready for the return fire and hit the ground dodging 
most of the barrage. The shots that found thier mark pushed him back, 
his frame was holding but if he continued taking this kind of abuse 
he'd be swiss cheese.

"Back off monster"He shouted through his comm "This is the only 
warning you will get."

He let his rifle gather up more energy before rising up and firing 
again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Inferno731@a... wrote:
> Ares gets hit by Lunarpine's shots and transfroms to robot mode 
retruning 
> fire.
